title: Ticket #7891: fix scary sounding "duplicate session" error in NegotiatorLog
description:
When the Negotiator is processing submitter ads, you often see a bunch of these messages: 

11/16/20 22:41:40 Phase 2:  Performing accounting ...
11/16/20 22:41:41 SECMAN: failed to create session <192.170.227.146:9618?addrs=192.170.227.146-9618&alias=login05.osgconnect.net&noUDP&sock=schedd_1639162_5eee>#1605574692#279 (key already exists).
11/16/20 22:41:41 SECMAN: existing session <192.170.227.146:9618?addrs=192.170.227.146-9618&alias=login05.osgconnect.net&noUDP&sock=schedd_1639162_5eee>#1605574692#279:

We need to:

  1. Make sure these are benign. We think they are but I would like to know the reason they are being printed.
  2. Remove them or make them less frightening ("DEBUG: not creaing new session since one already existed, continuing...") or some such.
remarks:
2020-Nov-21 08:00:24 by tim:
Looks good. Cherry-picked back to stable.
check_ins:
2020-Nov-21 07:17   Check-in [61717]: Make "found existing session" debug info less scary and not at D_ALWAYS. #7891 Committer: Tim Theisen (By zmiller )
2020-Nov-20 09:59   Check-in [61714]: Make "found existing session" debug info less scary and not at D_ALWAYS. #7891 (By zmiller )
